Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the police department from collecting DNA from a minor without consent from a parent, legal guardian or attorney
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the police department from collecting DNA from a minor without consent from a parent, legal guardian or attorney.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to abolishing the criminal group database and prohibiting the establishment of a successor database
Items.MatterName: Abolishing the criminal group database and prohibiting the establishment of a successor database.
